description: Mick and his buddy were studying for a final. Frustrated and burnt out, Mick decides he needs a break. He is also very tense, so his friend offers him a relaxing massage. You know because it's just between two straight guys right. Wrong. That was a window of opportunity for them to explore each other and get that much needed relaxation. Mick's friend decides to massage his cock and balls, it was a first for Mick. At that point they both agree that what happens between the two of them, stays between them only. Let's just say the massage lead to a lot more than just some rubbing.
title: Dose Of Dick
